About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I firmly believe that The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success... I'm so curious. I like challenges. I think that The most powerful people are the ones who never stop learning. I strongly mean self-learning and the powerful example is the legend Albert Einstein didn't believe in the Prussian education system Wich was followed in his times and was determined to do self-study and teach himself.. I'm a free spirited person, I'm eager to learn and I wish to keep growing as a person. I’ve faced a lot of troubles in my life, a lot of failures, but, I was able to get up whenever I feel pushed down, and that’s what made me that girl I’m today.
